name: Dear Mayor,
description:
Please note that this project is still in development!

You are the mayor of "Frogville" and your duties are to read (or not) the letters that arrive at your desk everyday and decide what to do with them!

There is 1 main storyline (The Superhero arc)! With every new run you get a mix of random letters mixed with the main storyline.

There are 15 endings that you can unlock! with 11 of them as soft endings (they end the game but give you a giftbox for later updates!) (Some endings can lead to the same event but since the path is different, it counts as a new ending)

This game is set in a the Club Olympus universe that I'm building slowly :3 One of my other games "I love you, but.." is also set in that universe and hopefully I can expand on it in future games as well!

Music/Sound effects by: Chris Lucca (@FlipLucca)

Logo: Star St.Germain (@thisisstar)

The rest of the game was developed by me (@mickehh_)! So expect some bugs here and there and please alert me in the comments about any weird or unexpected behaviors or typos that you encounter. (hopefully you won't!)

I started this game for a 2 week game jam run by @GIGathering the profit jam! And I was supposed to finish a game in 2 weeks and release it by June 1st, 2021! Good News though, there will be more main storylines to come! 

When will updates arrive? I will be updating the game for bug fixes and improvements all the time until the last "main update" gets here!

This is a time table for the "main updates", which means that it will have new content (stories and endings)! Smaller updates may or may not have new content (Dev logs will explain once the updates are out).

by June 30th, 2021Update 1Extraterrestrial Update TBDUpdate 2Pantheon Takeover Update

Please consider donating/purchasing the game so I can keep working on it and future games!
